author: Staff Reporter
text:
Forensic experts from Coimbatore Medical College Hospital on Thursday conducted a post-mortem examination of the bodies of the two women found murdered in a house on the Avinashi Road, on Wednesday.

The deceased have been identified as Papathi (60), and her daughter Geetha (35).

The police are yet to arrest anyone.

Papathi had earlier lodged complaints with the police, and the District Collector against certain persons who were allegedly performing black magic to ruin her family.
title: Post-mortem examination conducted
